sentences.sContent: Foreign aid from many countries poured into the famine area.
sentences.sCn: 来自许多国家的救援物资纷纷送到饥荒地区。

sentences.sContent: ...were only too willing to accept hundreds of billions of dollars from the government in the aid programs that have been a recurring feature of the global economy since the beginning of the Thatcher-Reagan era of "free" markets and deregulation...
...which are often known for robust financial aid packages and remarkably high graduation rates for first-generation students...
...Food and aid poured in from most developed countries into the continent...
...It's legitimate to debate how much we should aid the poor or reduce economic inequality...
...Some schools out for profit cynically increase tuitions and count on student loans and federal aid to foot the bill – knowing full well that the students won't make it...

phrases.pCn: vt. 帮助；帮助（在...给予帮助）
经济援助；助学金；财政补助
国家补助；（美）州政府对地方公共事业的补助费

trans.tranCn: 帮助，救护；助手，辅助手段
trans.tranOther: help that you need to do a particular thing
